subject: RE: [junit] junit4: removeTestListener
msgSnippet: Elliotte, Runner.removeListener() is in CVS. Thanks for the suggestion. Kent Beck Three Rivers Institute
messageBody:
Elliotte,

Runner.removeListener() is in CVS. Thanks for the suggestion.

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute

> -----Original Message-----
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of Elliotte Rusty Harold
> Sent: Tuesday, September 27, 2005 8:21 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] junit4: removeTestListener
>
> Does org.junit.runner.Runner need a removeListener to go along with
> addListener and getListeners methods? This could be useful
> when starting
> with an existing test runner that installs a listener you
> then want to
> remove.
>
>
